lines.text: There's one thing every little kid knows. Daddies mean fun; mommies mean business.

You think I'm just some guy from Fresno who tinkered with crack pot ideas in his attic? Well let me tell you something, this country was built on the shoulders of people who tinkered with crack pot ideas in their attics, basements and backyards. Alexander Graham Bell worked in a two room flat!

Young man, don't presume to stand there and lecture me about great minds and great inventors. In all my years I've never worked with anyone who is a fool and I don't intend to start now. So, Charles, you're fired.
What?
You're fired! So, Szalinski, what is your plan to get your kid back to normal by bed time?
Oh no. Honey, I shrunk the kids.
This is your last warning.
[Adam chucks a lamp at him]
Okay, I'll give you one more warning.
I don't understand any of this.
Around every electrical operating device, there's a flux. Like an electromagnetic force field.
That's what's causing the baby to grow.
Would this electromagnetic... would it surround neon lights too?
Yeah, why?
Your kid. He's heading toward Las Vegas.
Uh-oh.
[Diane has grown to giant size and catches Charles Hendrickson in a helicopter menacing Adam with a tranquilizer gun]

[to Charles]
BACK OFF!
Mr. Sterling, sir, I can return my son back to normal!
You can?
With what, Szalinski? Coca Cola bottles? Perhaps some chewing gum and twine?
Just who do you think you are talking to him like that?
Diane, let me handle this. Who do you think you are talking to me like that?
I blew up the baby!
[Diane faints]
Mama fall down! Mama!

[appears from behind Adam]
How'd she take it?
About like usual.
Mama sleeping?

[seeing how large Adam has gotten]
There is no way I'm changing those diapers.
We're his parents, we'll handle this. Diane, how do we handle this?
Just who do you think you are talking to him like that?
Diane, let me handle this. Who do you think you are talking to me like that?
I fix it!
Don't fix it, Adam, just put down Mommy's coffee table.
Dad, were you ever popular in school?
You bet. I was president of the astronomy club three years in a row. We were happenin' guys.
Why are you closing the shutters?
So one of the neighbors doesn't look in, see a 7 foot baby, and call the National Enquirer.

[hears the doorbell ringing]
Doorbell!
Who's that?
One of the neighbors.

[sarcastically]
So far your plan has been working perfectly.
[after Wayne finds Nick and Mandy in the shrunken car]
Found them. I think we'd better give them a while though.
Adam! Don't eat us!
[repeated line]
Toy car...

[he is driving an ice cream truck with an ice cream bar on the hood]
The next thing I knew, he grabbed it right off the truck.
What did he do with it?
What do you think he did with it?
[the ice cream bar, made of metal, has a bite taken out of it and is short-circuited]

[Adam is back to normal size; Brooks gives him an ice cream bar and smiles]
Hey, big fella. Is this what you were looking for?

[Repeated line]
No nap!
